title: Re-learning the Value of Money
subtitle: Frugality as a Hindrance
preview: I thought of it as scarce, as the most prized commodity. In turn, leading me to not being as generous as I could have been, quite frugal in the moments where it could potentially hinder my relationships with people, wasting tons of time on negligible money-related decisions, and in general turning me into a person I didn't like when it came to the topic of money.
